shortBio: John Smith is an award-winning chef with a passion for creating delicious and innovative dishes.

ingredients: 1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined
recipes.cookingMethod: Preheat grill to high. Toss shrimp with oil, garlic, chili powder, and cumin. Grill shrimp until pink and cooked through, about 2-3 minutes per side.
